metadata.title: CVE-2022-1116 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - high
metadata.description:
Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in io_uring of Linux Kernelallows local attacker to cause memory corruption and escalate privileges toroot. This issue affects: Linux Kernel versions prior to 5.4.189; version5.4.24 and later versions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1116` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-kvm - 5.15.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1009-aws - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required

No subscription required
